title: Coverage, Briefing Set for NASA’s Artemis II Moon Rocket Roll to Pad
summary: NASA’s integrated SLS (Space Launch System) rocket and Orion spacecraft for the Artemis II mission is inching closer to launch – literally. title: CAS Space conducts first suborbital launch and capsule landing test
summary:
Chinese commercial firm CAS Space launched its first Lihong-1 suborbital flight and recovery test mission, seeing a successful parachute descent of the capsule.

title: Live coverage: NASA, SpaceX prepare ‘medical evacuation’ Crew-11 return to Earth
summary: The three astronauts and cosmonaut are scheduled to undock from the space station at 5:05 p.m. EST (2205 UTC) on Wednesday, Jan. 14, and splashdown off the coast of California at 3:41 a.m. EST (0841 UTC).
